name: Music Address
description:
Music Address offers you a hard-time rhythm game, where you must hit almost every note perfectly, using the arrows.
It (will) includes a lot of cool songs for each level and even a difficulty. Currently in Alpha 0.1. 

Credits to DaveJF and gamesplusjames.
More levels will appear in future updates.
Check out for updates on Reddit at R/MusicAddress.
Send songs made by yourself, which you consider I should add to the game at stevesfara20@gmail.com
